description.value:
This rune utilizes magical principles used in an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Immovable Rod].

Activate 1 Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect Your armor anchors you in place, even defying gravity, rendering you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Immobilized] until you Dismiss the Activation. While you're immobilized in this way, you can be moved only if a creature succeeds at a @Check[type:athletics|dc:40|traits:action:force-open] check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Force Open] your armor. You can also be moved if 8,000 pounds of pressure are placed upon you, though this is likely fatal.
